src

Class DatabaseConn

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.DatabaseConn

  • public class DatabaseConn
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConn class manages all connection with the externally hosted database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseConn()
      Create the instance by trying to connect to the database.

    • Method Summary

      • connected

        public boolean connected()
        Check if the object is indeed connected to the database.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is connected to the database, false otherwise

      • getMySqlConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getMySqlConnection()
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Start the connection with necessary credentials and return the Connection object
        Returns:
        The Connection object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws all exception should the program fail to connect

      • addAccount

        public int addAccount(Account toAdd,
                      java.lang.String pass)
        Adds the details of the user to the account table, generate a unique ID for the user, store a hashed version of the password along with the ID in the login table.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - the account object to extract data from and add to the database
        pass - the password of the account
        Returns:
        the unique account ID of the user created by the database

      • login

        public Account login(java.lang.String accName,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Loads the details of the user in an Account instance based on user name and password,
        Parameters:
        accName - name of the account
        password - password associated with the account
        Returns:
        the account instance with the necessary details, returns null if there is no such account
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - any SQL error that the method faces

      • changeUser

        public boolean changeUser(java.lang.String accName,
                          java.lang.String newStr,
                          java.lang.String field)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Change the name or timezone of the user on the database
        Parameters:
        accName - name of the account
        newStr - the new String to replace it with
        field - the field to replace
        Returns:
        true if the changed successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - any SQL error faced by the method

      • changeUserPass

        public boolean changeUserPass(java.lang.String accName,
                              java.lang.String oldPass,
                              java.lang.String newpass)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Change the password of the user
        Parameters:
        accName - name of the account to change the password of
        oldPass - current password to verify the authenticity
        newpass - new password
        Returns:
        true if the old password is entered currently and the database is updated with new password, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - any SQL error faced by the method

      • addEvent

        public int addEvent(Event toAdd)
        Add an event to the event table with the necessary details.
        Parameters:
        toAdd - the event to add
        Returns:
        the ID of the event auto-generated by the database, returns -1 if faced with error

      • loadEvents

        public AllEvents loadEvents(Account ofUser)
        Return an AllEvents instance loaded with all the events attributed to the logged in user.
        Parameters:
        ofUser - the user to load events of
        Returns:
        AllEvents instance loaded with all the events of the specified user.
